    • Finishers

    Power trowels differ in the way they are controlled: Ride-on power trowels are used by an operator sitting on a seat upon the machinery, controlling the power trowel with the necessary buttons. Walk-behind power trowels are used by an operator walking behind the machine. A hand tool for the same task is called a concrete float.
